synopsis.text: Ruthless and calculating, Erwin Smith is a burgeoning force within the Survey Corps, representing humanity's last stand against the monstrous Titans. Meanwhile, in the bowels of the city, a world away from Erwin's strategic machinations, the notorious criminal Levi ekes out a living amidst the capital's discarded waste. As the leader of his own illicit operations, Levi navigates the grim underbelly of society with the aid of his accomplices, Isabel Magnolia and Farlan Church. When an opportunity arises to secure citizenship aboveground by eliminating Erwin, Levi finds himself at a crossroads. As these two ambitious men collide, they discover that the surface world is fraught with its own perils, and freedom may come at a cost neither could have foreseen. Delve into the untold story of how Captain Levi and Commander Erwin forged their unbreakable bond in this gripping prequel to the smash hit, Attack on Titan.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
